name: ConformanceStatementKind
description: How a conformance statement is intended to be used.

concept.definition: The Conformance instance represents the present capabilities of a specific system instance.  This is the kind returned by OPTIONS for a FHIR server end-point.

extension.valueString: Elements marked as 'optional' represent configurable capabilities

concept.definition: The Conformance instance represents the capabilities of a system or piece of software, independent of a particular installation.
The Conformance instance represents a set of requirements for other systems to meet; e.g. as part of an implementation guide or 'request for proposal'.
